mapper.select: SELECT i.id,i.name, ch.charging, ch.availablePieces,i.description,i.url,i.requestParams,i.requestHeader,i.responseHeader,i.status,i.method,i.userId,i.createTime,i.updateTime,i.isDelete FROM interface_info i LEFT JOIN interface_charging ch ON i.id=ch.interfaceid where i.isDelete=0 and i.status=1
